extendedInfo.description: All the competitions UK and contests from the UK, totally free without any sort of ads. We have 20 new competitions selected and manually filtered each day. That's how we can provide only quality competitions for our users. We include Lorraine competitions, tv competitions, giveaways, free stuff, photography competitions, wedding competitions, writing competitions, pretty much all the competitions from the UK.We've had users win multiple prizes in just one month. We constantly receive e-mails thanking us for our service. Hopefully, you'll be one of the folks who wins a vacation, a car or some other free stuff.

reviews.title: Quite good app but!
reviews.comment: This is a good app in as much as it has many up to date comps with great prizes but its a pain because once you have finished on whatever comps website and click the back button it doesnt take you back to where you were on the list so you have to aimlessly scroll down through the whole lot again, in fact, often it returns to the app itself which is so frustrating and puts you off using it. If ty can sort those problems out it would definately get 5 stars.
reviews.author: Carol Packer

reviews.title: Needs updating
reviews.comment: Says 20 new competitions added daily...not true. Its now the 14th june and its  still only got competitions from the 10th june back to may 31st but not everyday in between. Needs updating quicker! Apart from that the comps are good and look legal.
reviews.author: Chloe Minton
